message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only spend up to $10,000. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 to purchase the product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below my asking price.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10,500 to purchase the product.
